skill.name: site-management
skill.description: Manage and monitor UniFi sites across your account. View site details, organization structure, and multi-site overview for centralized infrastructure management.

skill.author: DataKnifeAI

security_audit.summary: This skill consists only of documentation (SKILL.md) describing UniFi site management capabilities. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system access are present. Pure prompt-based documentation for AI interaction.

content.value_statement: Managing multiple UniFi sites across your network infrastructure requires manual access to each dashboard. This skill provides centralized site oversight, allowing you to list all sites, retrieve detailed configurations, and generate inventory reports through simple conversational queries.
actual_capabilities: List all UniFi sites in your account
Get detailed information for specific sites
View site overview statistics and metrics
limitations: Limited to sites accessible by provided credentials
Does not provision new sites or network devices

use_cases.title: Multi-site oversight
use_cases.description: View all UniFi sites across your organization and verify their configurations from a single interface.

use_cases.title: Infrastructure reporting
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive site inventory reports for compliance documentation and resource planning.

use_cases.title: Site planning
use_cases.description: Analyze existing site structures to identify gaps and plan new deployments across locations.

prompt_templates.title: List all sites
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me all UniFi sites in my account with their names and locations.

prompt_templates.title: Site details
prompt_templates.prompt: What is the configuration of my headquarters site? Include all available details.

prompt_templates.title: Organization view
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the full organization structure of all my UniFi sites.

prompt_templates.title: Inventory report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a complete site inventory report for all my UniFi locations.

best_practices: Maintain consistent naming conventions across all sites for easier identification.
Regularly review site configurations to ensure standardization and compliance.
Use site inventory reports to track device distribution and plan capacity.
anti_patterns: Don't rely on memory for site details - query the skill for accurate information.
Avoid modifying configurations without first reviewing current settings.
Don't ignore site health alerts - use overview tools to monitor status regularly.

faq.question: What UniFi products does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill works with UniFi Network accounts that include site management capabilities through the UniFi API.

faq.question: How many sites can I manage at once?
faq.answer: The skill can list and manage all sites accessible through your UniFi account credentials without specific limits.

faq.question: Does this integrate with other UniFi tools?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on site management. Other skills or tools handle device-level control and network configuration.

faq.question: Is my credential data stored?
faq.answer: Credentials are managed by your MCP client and are never stored or logged by this skill documentation.

faq.question: Why am I seeing authentication errors?
faq.answer: Verify your UniFi credentials have access to the sites you're querying. Check account permissions and API access.

faq.question: How is this different from the UniFi Console?
faq.answer: This skill provides programmatic access through AI conversation. The Console offers a full GUI for manual management.
